### Annual Juvenile Hare Trap Counts 

```{r}
juvenile_hares <- hares %>% 
  filter(age=="j") %>% 
  get_dupes(trap) %>% 
  mutate(date_new = mdy(date)) %>% 
  mutate(year = year(date_new)) %>% 
  group_by(year)

ggplot(data=juvenile_hares, aes(x=year)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=14,color="black", fill="burlywood4")+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = 1999:2012)+
  theme_classic()+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))+
  labs(title="Annual Juvenile Hare Trap Counts",
       x="Year",
       y="# of Hares")
  
#Need to create x-axis scale with years 

```
